text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
When we meet Fuji Kiseki's mother, we<n>learn that,
despite being a famous actor,<n>she struggles with
stage fright to this<n>day.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Fuji Kiseki learns something important<n>from her
mother's words. She realizes<n>that what she needs
to stand on the turf<n>is the will to keep taking on
challenges<n>even if she fails.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
She gains a new sense of determination.<n>I know in
my heart she can overcome<n>anything she sets her
mind to.
